name: libpthread-stubs
description:
The libpthread-stubs package provides weak aliases for pthread functions
not provided in libc or otherwise available by default.

dependent_to.name: libdrm
dependent_to.description:
A userspace library for accessing the DRM, direct rendering manager, on
Linux, BSD and other systems supporting the ioctl interface.

dependent_to.name: libxcb
dependent_to.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.

dependent_to.name: veloc
dependent_to.description:
Very-Low Overhead Checkpointing System. VELOC is a multi-level
checkpoint-restart runtime for HPC supercomputing infrastructures
